d3b4089f-5294-4cc7-ab87-607991e40562.description: MySkills4Afrika has enabled earners to use their skills, expertise and time with Customers, Partners, ISVs, Start-ups and individuals to help increase the regions competitiveness. This program enables earners to transfer vital skills which help Africans to grow, innovate, and compete globally as they build their leadership skills.
d3b4089f-5294-4cc7-ab87-607991e40562.name: MySkills Mentor

badge_template_activities.title: Has volunteered to mentor individuals in Africa for periods up to 3 months 
Provides career and personal guidance and constructive feedback while encouraging the mentee to gain confidence in their own skills and intellectual independence 
Has completed all the required tasks of the program including impact assessment survey and debrief report

29dbebac-7cd1-40ed-8361-f0fc571516e0.description: MySkills4Afrika has enabled earners to use their skills, expertise and time with Customers, Partners, ISVs, Start-ups and individuals to help increase the regions competitiveness. This program enables earners to transfer vital skills which help Africans to grow, innovate, and compete globally as they build their leadership skills, collaboration and problem-solving skills through exposure to new markets and business challenges.
29dbebac-7cd1-40ed-8361-f0fc571516e0.name: MySkills Volunteer

badge_template_activities.title: Has volunteered onsite between 2-4 times for periods of up-to 2 weeks or virtually for up to 3 months 
Has worked directly with Customers, Partners, ISVs, Start-ups and individuals providing them with 1:1 support that meets their specific needs and challenges. 
Has completed all the required tasks of the program including impact assessment survey and debrief report

90dde772-a60c-4d07-a826-15d90471c307.description: MySkills4Afrika has enabled earners to use their skills, expertise and time with Customers, Partners, ISVs, Start-ups and individuals to help increase the regions competitiveness. This program enables earners to transfer vital skills which help Africans to grow, innovate, and compete globally as they build their leadership skills, collaboration and problem-solving skills through exposure to new markets and business challenges
90dde772-a60c-4d07-a826-15d90471c307.name: MySkills Volunteer

badge_template_activities.title: Has volunteered once onsite for periods of up-to 2 weeks or virtually for up to 3 months
Has worked directly with Customers, Partners, ISVs, Start-ups and individuals providing them with 1:1 support that meets their specific needs and challenges. 
Has completed all the required tasks of the program including impact assessment survey and debrief report

d4f40f33-ddf6-4a3a-b4b2-646e9cb36bc3.description: MySkills4Afrika has enabled earners to use their skills, expertise and time with Customers, Partners, ISVs, Start-ups and individuals to help increase the regions competitiveness. This program enables earners to transfer vital skills which help Africans to grow, innovate, and compete globally as they build their leadership skills, collaboration and problem-solving skills through exposure to new markets and business challenges
d4f40f33-ddf6-4a3a-b4b2-646e9cb36bc3.name: MySkills Volunteer

badge_template_activities.title: Has volunteered onsite for a minimum of 5 projects for periods of up-to 2 weeks or virtually for up to 3 months 
Has worked directly with Customers, Partners, ISVs, Start-ups and individuals providing them with 1:1 support that meets their specific needs and challenges. 
Has completed all the required tasks of the program including impact assessment survey and debrief report
